title: Pool Party taliyah?
body: Wouldn't Taliyah make a perfect candidate for a pool party skin? can ride a surf board for her passive and make a giant wall of coral for her ult. just wondering if anybody had thought about it over at riot.

replies.body: Wouldn't "Coral Reef Taliyah" be a better fit for that idea, since surfboards and coral are generally associated with the ocean not pools?
What about make taliyah a decent champ that can actually do something before she gets a skin
that idea is awesome actually, but what taliyah should wear.....during a "pool party", a bikini??{{champion:163}}
What about BakeryTime Taliyah, she can ride a bread stick.
